author: veithen
msg: Expanded the code coverage generated by TestSerializeToXMLWriterFromReader and fixed an issue that caused OMSourcedElement#getXMLStreamReaderWithoutCaching to unnecessarily build nodes. This also sheds some light on AXIOM-201 and AXIOM-431.
